channel.title: Comments on: Speed Spray?
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
So I had to google for "electricity powder", and look what I found: http://bumppo.net/lists/fun-with-perl/2000/05/msg00039.html
Maybe it's something popular among those who fix flat batteries...
item.content:encoded:
So I had to google for “electricity powder”, and look what I found:
http://bumppo.net/lists/fun-with-perl/2000/05/msg00039.html

Maybe it’s something popular among those who fix flat batteries…

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Well, at least they made it compatible with Linux.
Reminds me of Sagi Achishar looking for electricity powder in Jalame.
item.content:encoded:
Well, at least they made it compatible with Linux.

Reminds me of Sagi Achishar looking for electricity powder in Jalame.
